name: Gardenz
description:
Welcome in the gardens. The bees collect the pollen from the flowers and you have to help them reach the next garden to the right.
Move the flowerbeds to unblock the way for the bees. Just slide the beds in the new position, but horizontal flowerbeds can only move horizontally and vertical ones can only move in vertical direction.
A puzzle game with endless fun and countless puzzles. In the easy level section there are 7000 challenging tasks. The medium level section covers 4000 puzzles to solve. The hard level section has 1500 puzzles and the expert section another 800. Enough puzzles to fly for a long time.
